Module WGUScheduler
Package com.example.wgusoftware2scheduler.Models

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
com.example.wgusoftware2scheduler.Models.Appointment
public class Appointment extends Object
The Appointment class represents an appointment with various attributes and provides methods for validating and checking time overlaps. This class uses JavaFX properties to enable data binding with the user interface.

    • isValid

      public static boolean isValid(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate, int userID, int customerID, int contactID) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Validates the appointment data by checking if the provided fields are not empty, if the start date is before the end date, if the start time is before the end time, and if the appointment is within the business hours of 08:00 and 22:00 EST.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the appointment
      description - the description of the appointment
      location - the location of the appointment
      type - the type of the appointment
      startDate - the start date and time of the appointment
      endDate - the end date and time of the appointment
      userID - the user ID associated with the appointment
      customerID - the customer ID associated with the appointment
      contactID - the contact ID associated with the appointment
      Returns:
      true if the appointment data is valid, otherwise an IllegalArgumentException is thrown
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the validation checks fail

    • checkTimeOverlap

      public static boolean checkTimeOverlap(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate, int userID)
      Check if the appointment time overlaps with any existing appointments for the user.
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date/time of the appointment
      endDate - the end date/time of the appointment
      userID - the user ID associated with the appointment
      Returns:
      true if the appointment time does not overlap with any existing appointments for the user
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the appointment overlaps with another appointment

    • checkTimeOverlap

      public static boolean checkTimeOverlap(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate, int userID, int appID)
      Checks if the given time interval overlaps with any of the existing appointments for the given user. Makes use of Lambda expressions in coordination with the java streams for simpler processing. for example the filter function takes a predecate and returns ture or false and is implemented via the arrow function form of a lambda expression
      Parameters:
      startDate - the start date and time of the appointment
      endDate - the end date and time of the appointment
      userID - the ID of the user for whom to check the appointments
      appID - the ID of the appointment being checked (excluded from the check)
      Returns:
      true if the time interval does not overlap with any existing appointments, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the time interval overlaps with an existing appointment for the given user
